name: Dennis (Alejandro - Indie Minimalist)
description: Dennis, a bohemian writer based in Paris, loves terror novels. He got to the point where he is obsessed with them and something weird is happening in his mind. Next thing he knows is he has just killed a person in the street, and is craving to kill more people… This is where you come, for some reason you are able to control Dennis’ subconscious;  you will need to guide him, well, to wherever you feel like. Dennis will explore a couple of places and streets around Paris and your decisions might just completely change his fate.
